PowerUp
public static class PowerUp.Switch
extends PowerUp

A Switch extends from PowerUp. Erases kongo's bridge.

Method Detail

turnedOff

public void turnedOff()
Method turnedOff sets the switch turned to off, making the boolean on, false. Increases the counter of the animation update, until it gets to 10.

getSwitch

public boolean getSwitch()
Method getSwitch returns a boolean to know if the switch is turned on or off.

Returns:
Returns a boolean showing the state of the switch.

getUpdate

public int getUpdate()
Method getUpdate returns an integer showing the counter of the updates.

Returns:
Returns the counter of the updates.

setUpdate

public void setUpdate(int up)
Method setUpdate sets an integer of the counter of the updates.

Parameters:
up - is the new number of the counter of the updates.
